name: Slime Slice
description:
Slime Slice is a 2D puzzle(ish) platformer made for the GDevelop Game Jam #3. Slime Slice was designed to be difficult, although you can be the judge of that.

Volume options included in settings. Press P, Escape, or Enter to pause the game.

Feedback Appreciated! If the game crashes, refresh the page.

All music by TeknoAXE! Title Font by Jadatype! All Credits included in-game.

No purchases/commercial use were made of the "Slimespooky" font, so use of it is allowed.

http://teknoaxe.com/Home.php

https://www.dafont.com/jada-akbal.d8132

Play on Liluo : https://liluo.io/magicalmcboss/slime-slice
